updateContentCommand: apt update && apt install -y webp python3 pip ca-certificates curl gnupg git && mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https://deb.nodesource.com/node_18.x nodistro main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list && apt-get update && apt-get install nodejs -y && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
